title: Talam Transform Berhad First Quarter 2026 Earnings: RM0.007 loss per share (vs RM0.005 loss in 1Q 2025)
description: Talam Transform Berhad ( KLSE:TALAMT ) First Quarter 2026 Results Key Financial Results Revenue: RM3.05m (up 65% from...
content:
• RM0.007 loss per share (further deteriorated from RM0.005 loss in 1Q 2025).

This technology could replace computers: discover the 20 stocks are working to make quantum computing a reality.

All figures shown in the chart above are for the trailing 12 month (TTM) period

You should learn about the 2 warning signs we've spotted with Talam Transform Berhad (including 1 which can't be ignored).

summary: The article discusses the two warning signs that have been spotted with Talam Transform Berhad, including a decrease in its performance and a decline in its share value. The article is based on historical data and analyst forecasts, but does not constitute a recommendation for a purchase or sale. The analysis may not factor in the company's future.

| 1920 | 62 | Mohamad bin Mohamad Rahim | www.ttransform.com.my |
Talam Transform Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the property development business in Malaysia. It operates through Property Development, Property Investment and Management, and Construction segments. The company develops and sells residential and commercial properties.

argos_summary: Talam Transform Berhad, a Malaysian property development holding company, posted a worsening loss per share of RM0.007 in the latest quarter, down from RM0.005 in Q1 2025, amid declining revenue and earnings and a high debt‑to‑equity ratio of 20.2%. The company remains unprofitable with a net margin of –34.41% and negative return on equity, raising concerns about its financial health and debt sustainability. The article also includes a separate list of 23 quantum‑computing firms, highlighting their market caps and recent performance, though this section is unrelated to Talam Transform’s financials.
